#summary DASe Atom Categories and Link Relations
#labels Featured

== Atom Categories ==

scheme prefix is: http://daseproject.org/category/

  * collection  (<collection_ascii_id>)
  * collection/item_count
  * collection/visibility (public | private)*

  * entrytype (attribute | collection | item)
  * feedtype (collection | collection_list | search | item | tag)

  * item/serial_number (<serial_number>)
  * item/status (public | draft | delete )*
  * item/type (<type_ascii_id>)*

  * tag/background (<color or hex code>)*
  * tag/type (set | slideshow | cart | admin)*
  * tag/visibility (public | private)*

  * tag_item/id (<integer>)
  * tag_item/position (<integer>)*

\* can be changed w/ AtomPub

==Atom Link relations ==

prefix is: http://daseproject.org/relation/
  
  * collection (a link to the collection that this feed/entry applies to)
  * collection/attributes
  * feed-link (used to populate the "up" link on a search item)
  * media-collection (each item "contains" a media collection)
  * search-item (w/in a search result, appearing in an entry)
  * tag ("up" link in tag set)
